A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disappointing...poorly made ..fundamentally doesn't understand Luke and all the characters end up where they began\,The look of this movie is on point.It fails at making me excited to see whats next.The problem of a non linear vision for this story is apparent\, I am sad and disapointed.Please I can only hope that we can learn from this and JJ can put this beloved franchise back together.....
